event.title: June Social Meetup
event.description:
A chance to come along and informally discuss all things scrum and agile with members of our group.

We have a diverse mix of members with a wide range of experience; so this is a great opportunityÂ to discuss your own situations, share (or solve) problems and to seek inspiration!

The Cork in Bath have reserved an area for us upstairs - or if we are really lucky the sun will be out and we can use the beer garden.

We look forward to seeing you there.
